HaBangNet - Proudly Serving Web Hosting Services since 2010

Available VPS Locations Available: Europe, China, Hong Kong, Singapore, Germany, Lithuania and United States

Virtualization Platform: OpenVZ and XEN PV

HaBangNet hired experience Technical Staff that work round the clock and available to resolve your problem at anytime you need us.

Only Available @ HostingDiscussion, Not listed on our website coupon.

FAQ Which New Customer Alway ask
* Does HaBangNet offer IPv6?
> Currently we does not offer any IPv6.

* Do you have a speedtest or IP for ping?
> Please visit our helpdesk for a speedtest on Download and Upload Speed.

* Does the VPS come managed.
> No. This VPS is Fully Self-Managed.

* I got more questions regards to your VPS.
> You can visit our VPS FAQ website for more information.

* What Virtualization Technology do you use for the VPS.
> Offer listed here is on OpenVZ, XEN PV is available on our website.
